info.title: Price Lists API
info.description:
To learn more about Price Lists, see [here](/api-docs/price-lists/price-list-overview). 

### Price List
A Price List allows you to populate different versions of catalog pricing and assign them to different Customer Groups.

get.description: Returns a list of *Price Lists*. Optional parameters can be passed in.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter items by id.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter items by name.

parameters.name: date_created
parameters.description: Filter items by date_created.

parameters.name: date_modified
parameters.description: Filter items by date_modified. For example `v3/catalog/products?date_last_imported:min=2018-06-15`

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of products.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of products.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the `Price List`; increments sequentially.

date_created.description: The date on which the `Price List` was created.

date_modified.description: The date on which the `Price List` was created.

name.description: The unique name of the Price List. Required in /POST.

active.description: Whether or not this `Price List` and its prices are active.  Defaults to `true`.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.
pagination.title: Pagination

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.

meta.title: Collection Meta

name.description: The unique name of the Price List. Required in /POST.

active.description: Whether or not this `Price List` and its prices are active.  Defaults to `true`.

schema.description:
PriceList Reponse returns for:

* Create a PriceList
* Get a PriceList
* Update a PriceList

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the `Price List`; increments sequentially.

date_created.description: The date on which the `Price List` was created.

date_modified.description: The date on which the `Price List` was created.

name.description: The unique name of the Price List. Required in /POST.

active.description: Whether or not this `Price List` and its prices are active.  Defaults to `true`.

meta.description: Empty meta object; may be used later.
meta.title: Meta

schema.title: Price List Response

409.description: `Price List` was in conflict with another Price List. This is the result of duplicate unique values, such as `name`.

allOf.description: Error payload for the BigCommerce API.

title.description: The error title describing the particular error.

allOf.title: Base Error

422.description: `Price List` was not valid. This is the result of missing required fields, or of invalid data. See the response for more details.

allOf.description: Error payload for the BigCommerce API.

title.description: The error title describing the particular error.

allOf.title: Base Error

delete.description: Deletes a *Price List*. All associated price records are also removed. Optional parameters can be passed in.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter items by id.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter items by name.

parameters.name: price_list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the `Price List` requested.

delete.description: Deletes a *Price List*. All associated price records are also removed.

parameters.name: price_list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the `Price List` requested.

get.description: Returns a list of *Price List Records* associated with a *Price List*.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Filter items by currency.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of products.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of products.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Sub-resources to include on a price record, in a comma-separated list. Valid expansions currently include `bulk_pricing_tiers` and `sku`.  Other valies will be ignored.

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: Filter items by price.

parameters.name: sale_price
parameters.description: Filter items by sale_price.

parameters.name: retail_price
parameters.description: Filter items by retail_price.

parameters.name: map_price
parameters.description: Filter items by map_price.

parameters.name: calculated_price
parameters.description: Filter items by calculated_price.

parameters.name: date_created
parameters.description: Filter items by date_created.

parameters.name: date_modified
parameters.description: Filter items by date_modified. For example `v3/catalog/products?date_last_imported:min=2018-06-15`

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Filter items by sku.

schema.description:
PriceRecord Collection Response returns for:
* Get All PriceList Records
* Get PriceList Records by Variant Id

calculated_price.description: The price of the variant as seen on the storefront if a price record is in effect. It will be equal to the `sale_price`, if set, and the `price` if there is not a `sale_price`.  Read only.

date_created.description: The date on which the Price entry was created.

date_modified.description: The date on which the Price entry was created.

product_id.description: The id of the `Product` this `Price Record`'s variant_id is associated with.  Read only.

allOf.description: Price Record object used in batch create or update.

price_list_id.description: The Price List with which this price set is associated.

variant_id.description: The variant with which this price set is associated. Either variant_id or sku is required.

sku.description: The variant with which this price set is associated. Either sku or variant_id is required.

currency.description: The 3-letter currency code with which this price set is associated.

allOf.title: Price Record Identifiers

price.description: The list price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog list price for the variant/product.

sale_price.description: The sale price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog sale price for the variant/product. If empty, the sale price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

retail_price.description: The retail price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog retail price for the variant/product.  If empty, the retail price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

map_price.description: The MAP (Manufacturer's Advertised Price) for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog MAP price for the variant/product. If empty, the MAP price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

quantity_min.description: The minimum quantity of associated variant in the cart needed to qualify for this tiers pricing.

quantity_max.description: The maximum allowed quantity of associated variant in the cart to qualify for this tiers pricing.

type.description: The type of adjustment that is made. Acceptable values: price – the adjustment amount per product; percent – the adjustment as a percentage of the original price; fixed – the adjusted absolute price of the product.

amount.description: The price adjustment amount. This value along with the type will decide the price per variant for the pricing tier.

sku.description: The SKU code associated with this `Price Record` if requested and it exists.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.
pagination.title: Pagination

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.

meta.title: Collection Meta

schema.title: PriceRecord Collection Response

put.description:
Creates or updates *Price List Records*. 

**Required Fields**
* currency

**Notes**

* Bulk Updates is supported by this endpoint. 
* Bulk requests are limited to 100 items per request.
* Only one bulk upsert can done at a time. Running more than one in parallel on the **same store** will cause a 429 error and the request will fail.

parameters.name: X-Strict-Mode
parameters.description: Header that determines whether the Batch API operates in strict mode or not.  Strict mode will reject the entire request if any item in the batch has an error.

items.description: Price Record object used in batch create or update.

variant_id.description: The variant with which this price set is associated. Either variant_id or sku is required.

sku.description: The sku for the variant with which this price set is associated.  Either sku or variant_id is required.

currency.description: The 3-letter currency code with which this price set is associated.

price.description: The list price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog list price for the variant/product.

sale_price.description: The sale price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog sale price for the variant/product. If empty, the sale price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

retail_price.description: The retail price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog retail price for the variant/product.  If empty, the retail price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

map_price.description: The MAP (Manufacturer's Advertised Price) for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog MAP price for the variant/product. If empty, the MAP price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

quantity_min.description: The minimum quantity of associated variant in the cart needed to qualify for this tiers pricing.

quantity_max.description: The maximum allowed quantity of associated variant in the cart to qualify for this tiers pricing.

type.description: The type of adjustment that is made. Acceptable values: price – the adjustment amount per product; percent – the adjustment as a percentage of the original price; fixed – the adjusted absolute price of the product.

amount.description: The price adjustment amount. This value along with the type will decide the price per variant for the pricing tier.

sku.description: The SKU code associated with this `Price Record` if requested and it exists.

items.title: PriceRecord Batch Item

200.description: Success response for batch PUT of `Price Records`.

schema.description: Empty object for Success case for Batch API.
schema.title: Success Batch Response

422.description: Error response for batch PUT of `Price Records`.  May include errors during partial update in non-strict mode.

schema.description: Errors during batch usage for the BigCommerce API.

items.description: Error during Price Record batch PUT.  Includes data sent in the request and errors.

data.description: Price Record object used in batch create or update.

price_list_id.description: The Price List with which this price set is associated.

variant_id.description: The variant with which this price set is associated. Either variant_id or sku is required.

sku.description: The variant with which this price set is associated. Either sku or variant_id is required.

currency.description: The 3-letter currency code with which this price set is associated.

data.title: Price Record Identifiers

items.title: PriceRecord Batch Error Set

schema.title: PriceRecord Batch Error Response

delete.description: Deletes a *Price List Record*. Deleting the records does not delete the Price List. Optional parameters can be passed in.

schema.description: No-content response for the BigCommerce API.

title.description: The error title describing the situation.

schema.title: No Content

parameters.description: ID of the variant on a product, or on an associated Price List Record.

FilterProductIdParam.name: product_id:in
FilterProductIdParam.description: A comma-separated list of ids of `Product`s whose prices were requested.

VariantIdParam.name: variant_id
VariantIdParam.description: ID of the variant on a product, or on an associated Price List Record.

FilterDateModifiedParam.name: date_modified
FilterDateModifiedParam.description: Filter items by date_modified. For example `v3/catalog/products?date_last_imported:min=2018-06-15`

FilterIncludePriceRecordParam.name: include
FilterIncludePriceRecordParam.description: Sub-resources to include on a price record, in a comma-separated list. Valid expansions currently include `bulk_pricing_tiers` and `sku`.  Other valies will be ignored.

PageParam.name: page
PageParam.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of products.

LimitParam.name: limit
LimitParam.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of products.

PriceListIdParam.name: price_list_id
PriceListIdParam.description: The ID of the `Price List` requested.

PriceRecordCurrencyParam.name: currency_code
PriceRecordCurrencyParam.description: The currency code associated with the price record being acted upon.

FilterVariantIdParam.name: variant_id:in
FilterVariantIdParam.description: The ID of the `Variant` whose prices were requested.

date_modified.description: The date on which the `Price List` was created.

name.description: The unique name of the Price List. Required in /POST.

active.description: Whether or not this `Price List` and its prices are active.  Defaults to `true`.

currency.description: The 3-letter currency code with which this price set is associated.

allOf.title: Price Record Identifiers

price.description: The list price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog list price for the variant/product.

sale_price.description: The sale price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog sale price for the variant/product. If empty, the sale price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

retail_price.description: The retail price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog retail price for the variant/product.  If empty, the retail price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

map_price.description: The MAP (Manufacturer's Advertised Price) for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog MAP price for the variant/product. If empty, the MAP price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

quantity_min.description: The minimum quantity of associated variant in the cart needed to qualify for this tiers pricing.

quantity_max.description: The maximum allowed quantity of associated variant in the cart to qualify for this tiers pricing.

type.description: The type of adjustment that is made. Acceptable values: price – the adjustment amount per product; percent – the adjustment as a percentage of the original price; fixed – the adjusted absolute price of the product.

amount.description: The price adjustment amount. This value along with the type will decide the price per variant for the pricing tier.

sku.description: The SKU code associated with this `Price Record` if requested and it exists.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.
pagination.title: Pagination

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.

date_modified.description: The date on which the Price entry was created.

product_id.description: The id of the `Product` this `Price Record`'s variant_id is associated with.  Read only.
